channel.title: Error with login
channel.description:
Ok, so I'm writing a framework from scratch("Scratch". Just a reworked winterlove login). I"ve got the sidebars to load, but I think I"m having a timing problem.
I'm using a TimerTask for the initialize method(instead of it being constantly called in a process method), and when I set the repetitionTime to 2500(2.5 seconds), it loads the side icons, and does a quick sendMessage, but it doesn't stop. Every 2.5 seconds it does the same thing. Prints the same message. Now, I think the reason it's doing it is because I have the TimerTask cycle through all players, and if the player is not online, it calls initialize(). However, whenever I make the initialize() set player.isOnline(true); it doesn't call the sendMessage(or if it does, it's not showing it) and I get disconnected almost instantly.
IF you have any suggestions, please say so. I"m probably going to upload a vid so you can see what is happening, because my explanation is not the best.

item.title: Error with login
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I"m using a timertask, because i didn’t like “called every 500ms” run method. It just got filled up with too much useless code, and lagged the server. And that’s why I said “from Scratch”

Read full topic

item.title: Error with login
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

why use a timer task, and if you re-working winterloves it’s not scratch.

Read full topic
